bug.short_desc: Adding flash scripting and change qx.ui.embed.Flash

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1092 qx.ui.embed.Flash
This should be in the core part of the framework.
Thanks for sharing the code and a solution. But unfortunately, you did not tell us the problem! So why should we add is and whats the problem its fixing?

Created attachment 1094 new version qx.ui.embed.Flash
new version

Created attachment 1095 new version qx.ui.embed.MFlashScripting
new version

The title says "Adding flash scripting...". It is an extension and rearrangement of the qx.ui.embed.Flash class to support flash scripting i.e. being able to communicate with the flash player from javascript.
As an example how it is used look at qxe.ui.control.DocumentViewer
By the way you forgot to acknowledge me with the code I contributed before to the qx.ui.embed.Flash class (loading and timeout functionality) and it was copied 99% as we contributed before!!!
We will contribute with some other examples too later on.
Move open issues to RESOLVED â€“ LATER, whose last comment is older than a year.
